Module it.polimi.ingsw.am38
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am38.Network.Server

Class ImplementerRmi

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am38.Network.Server.ImplementerRmi
All Implemented Interfaces:
ServerProtocolInterface
public class ImplementerRmi extends Object implements ServerProtocolInterface
ImplementerRmi is a class () that contains the needed elements to let the server manage the connection of the client associated with the player.

      y - coordinates on player's field
      face - chosen for the card placed
      points - given by the card placed
      symbolTab - VisibleElements updated with the elements given by the card placed
